findings.title: A01.Non-ERC20-Compliant DODOLpTokens
findings.description: The current implementation of `DODOLpToken` lacks standard fields such as `name`, `symbol`, and `decimals`, leading to non-compliance with ERC20 and potential confusion in naming, inspecting, and transferring tokenized shares.

findings.title: Balance Inconsistency With Deflationary Tokens
findings.description: The low-level asset-transferring routines may introduce unexpected balance inconsistencies when comparing internal asset records with external ERC20 token contracts, especially with deflationary tokens that charge fees for every transfer or transferFrom.

findings.title: Centralized Governance
findings.description: The system has a centralized governance model where the `_OWNER_` account has access to all privileged functions, which is not compatible with community-oriented governance and may lead to reduced risks.
